titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide travel expenses for family caregivers accompanying veterans to medical treatment facilities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: 6/4/2009--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs (VA) to reimburse family caregivers of disabled veterans for travel expenses, including lodging and subsistence, in connection with authorized VA treatment for such veterans.
